voucherIntro.headline: Gift Cards
voucherIntro.paragraphOne: Not sure what to give as a gift? Give the gift of time, flavor, and shared moments.
voucherIntro.paragraphTwo: Whether it’s a birthday, anniversaries, Christmas, or just because – our vouchers give the gift of a true culinary experience.
voucherIntro.paragraphThree: Simply visit us during our opening hours and speak to our on-site team.
voucherIntro.paragraphFour: MATJO vouchers are available directly at the restaurant. The voucher amount can be chosen freely.
